children.text: ({ children, type, direction, offset, scale }, ref)

<motion.div
                    ref={ref}
                    animate={{ rotate: 360 }}
                    transition={{
                        repeat: Infinity,
                        repeatType: 'loop',
                        duration: 2,
                        repeatDelay: 0
                    }}
                >
                    {children}
                </motion.div>

<motion.div
                    ref={ref}
                    animate={{ rotate: 360 }}
                    transition={{
                        repeat: Infinity,
                        repeatType: 'loop',
                        duration: 2,
                        repeatDelay: 0
                    }}
                >

<motion.div ref={ref} animate={{ y: y }} onHoverEnd={() => cycleY()} onHoverStart={() => cycleY()}>
                        {children}
                    </motion.div>
<motion.div ref={ref} animate={{ y: y }} onHoverEnd={() => cycleY()} onHoverStart={() => cycleY()}>

<motion.div ref={ref} animate={{ x: x }} onHoverEnd={() => cycleX()} onHoverStart={() => cycleX()}>
                        {children}
                    </motion.div>
<motion.div ref={ref} animate={{ x: x }} onHoverEnd={() => cycleX()} onHoverStart={() => cycleX()}>

<motion.div ref={ref} whileHover={{ scale: scale.hover }} whileTap={{ scale: scale.tap }}>
                    {children}
                </motion.div>
<motion.div ref={ref} whileHover={{ scale: scale.hover }} whileTap={{ scale: scale.tap }}>

AnimateButton.propTypes = {
    children: PropTypes.node,
    offset: PropTypes.number,
    type: PropTypes.oneOf(['slide', 'scale', 'rotate']),
    direction: PropTypes.oneOf(['up', 'down', 'left', 'right']),
    scale: PropTypes.oneOfType([PropTypes.number, PropTypes.object])
}

    direction: PropTypes.oneOf(['up', 'down', 'left', 'right']),
    scale: PropTypes.oneOfType([PropTypes.number, PropTypes.object])
}
